meaningMnemonic: The best way to <kanji>describe</kanji> your <kanji>feeling</kanji>s is with <vocabulary>lyricism</vocabulary>. Making a clear <vocabulary>description of feelings</vocabulary> is difficult, but it will make you feel better.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
